## Block.insert() method

Insert a blank record

**Signature:**

```typescript
insert(before?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  before | boolean | _(Optional)_ : Insert above the current row |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves to a boolean indicating the success of the operation.
